main event: A high-ranking government executive flying in an LTA C/C A/C aircraft from Pensacola sighted an illuminated object that performed erratic maneuvers over Zuni, New Mexico on October 14, 1952.
interesting points: The object had two flashing red lights above the main body.
The object performed maneuvers from hover to high speed and executed erratic changes in course.
The observer was a highly credible source, being the chief of a Senate and White House liaison and also a pilot.
The object was described as a light-colored, bluish object that reflected light on the top and was darker underneath.
